participant_1.name: Mark Johnson
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and honest, Mark expresses his dissatisfaction with life and is seeking change.
participant_1.background: i hate my job. i'm 40 years old. i work as a car salesman. my wife spends all my money. i am planning on getting a divorce.

participant_2.name: Sarah Thompson
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and family-oriented, Sarah enjoys simple pleasures and has a strong bond with her siblings.
participant_2.background: i live in alabama. i've one brother. i like tacos. i have three sisters. i love dogs.
